You can hire me to serve as your data mercenary! I have expertise in biostatistics, databases, data visualization, and predictive modeling. No two data sets are the same and every solution requires deep domain knowledge for it to be useful. I have experience working with large institutions on specific data needs and can deliver results in a timely fashion. If you have interest in hiring me to solve your data problem, inquire at [provance_consulting@icloud.com](mailto:provance_consulting@icloud.com).
